name: tilt_head
description:
Tilt the robot's head to the left or right.

This rolls the head to create a tilting motion.

optional.name: angle
optional.description: Angle to roll in degrees (default 15 degrees)

optional.name: duration
optional.description: Duration of the movement in seconds

optional.name: speech
optional.description: Optional text to speak via TTS while tilting head
